statement.description: Activated when the app launches to find user info.

sql.statement: SELECT login_name, security_profile, employee_id, emp_first_name first_name, employee_surname last_name, employee_short_name short_name, supervisor_id manager_id, e_mail_address, employee.office_type office_type, employee.office_code office_code, employee_position, home_db, region_code, office.branch_code FROM employee left outer join office on employee.office_code = office.office_code and nvl(nullif(employee.office_type,0),2) = office.office_type WHERE login_name = {username}

statement.description: Activated when the app launches to find user activity codes. Only look for activity codes used in dashboard. Add more as needed.

sql.statement: select distinct activity_code from applauth where activity_code in ({{activityCodes}}) and security_prof_code = {securityProfile}
